title: ‘Top Gun: Maverick’ Is Here!
description:
It. Is. Here! Tom Cruise’s Maverick flies again, after a years-long wait. Sean and Amanda break down the exhilarating arrival of ‘Top Gun: Maverick’ (1:00). Then, Joseph Kosinski, the film’s director, joins Sean to discuss, in great detail, how they made this action-packed return to the skies (41:00).

Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Joseph Kosinski
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
